roleset.name: attracted to both sexes

example.name: arg1
example.text: Nothing wrong with *PRO* being bi , but just as bi's have a taste for guys and girls , some people do n't have a taste for bi's , if you know what I mean

roleset.note: BISEXUAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on instance of 'bi' in BOLT-4,5. (from bisexual.01-j)
BI-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from bi.01-j)
